question: IIIDEM organized a Consultative Workshop for the Delegation from the Central Election Commission (CEC) of Kazakhstan in ____________.
explanation: India International Institute of Democracy and Election Management (IIIDEM) organized a Consultative Workshop in New Delhi for the Delegation from the Central Election Commission (CEC) of Kazakhstan. The delegation comprised six members including Vice-Chairman of CEC, Kazakhstan and other Senior Officials. Interactive discussions on the Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) & Role of Information Technology (IT) and a Training Programme were conducted during the course of this workshop.
